title: Orthopedic Sofa Dog Bed - Ultra Comfortable Dog Bed for Large Dogs - Breathable & Waterproof Pet Bed- Egg Foam Sofa Bed with Extra Head and Neck Support - (X-Large, Blue & White)
description: Egg Crate Orthopedic Foam Base: The egg-crate foam core soothes pressure points and provides great support for aching joints and muscles so pets can enjoy a more restorative night's rest. The peak-and-valley design also works to improve air circulation for enhanced comfort. Sleep Surface: The sleep surface is lined with embossed flannel ​fabric that is luxuriously soft to the touch, a great complement to the durable woven upholstery linen material covering the sides and bolsters. Bolster Design: The fluffy-filled bolsters are lightweight but supportive. The three-sided design ensures plenty of high-loft headrest cushion, as well as cozy nooks and crannies for pets to burrow into. The bolsters also provide great orthopedic support for aching joints.
